snippet: The BET gospel music series will have its 35th and final season premiere in October, signaling the end of an international platform for the genre.
abstract: BET announces that October 2015 will be final season for gospel music series Bobby Jones Gospel, which is ending because host is retiring; weekly program, started in 1980 when gospel industry had little visibility, welcomed unknown artists and is attributed to launching careers of many gospel performers; BET says new gospel program is planned but has not elaborated, forcing fans to worry they are losing genre’s only platform.
lead_paragraph: The BET gospel music series will have its 35th and final season premiere in October, signaling the end of an international platform for the genre.

headline.main: ‘Bobby Jones Gospel’ and Its Strongest Voice Prepare to Say Farewell
headline.print_headline: The Voice of a Gospel Show Prepares to Say Farewell
